resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Senior Validation Engineer with experience in Pharmaceutical Industry, ensuring compliance with FDA, GxP, and 21 CFR Part 11. Skilled in developing and executing IQ, OQ, and PQ protocols for manufacturing, packaging, bioreactors, autoclaves, and temperature-controlled units. Proficient in computerized system validation (CSV), risk assessments, and maintaining validation documentation such as Validation Master Plans (VMP), traceability matrices, and CAPAs.
